sentences.sContent: Hopes of economic recovery are fading.
sentences.sCn: 经济复苏的希望越来越渺茫。

sentences.sContent: ...It's key objective is to play so the center of recovery efforts...
...it takes four to five years after economic recovery for unemployment to return to pre-crisis levels...
...The divorce rate rose again during the rest of the decade as the recovery took hold...

trans.tranOther: the process of getting better after an illness, injury etc
